document_data.name: Aki's
document_data.mainbody: '''Aki's''' was a well-known restaurant in the town of [[Aru]] in [[Wa]] in the 1770s on the [[Wa Calendar]]. It was run by [[Aki Marushima]]. It stood in the Mixed District, beside the gate to the Merchant District and directly opposite rival restaurant [[Tojo's]].
document_data.History: In {{YearlinkConvert|1775|WY}}, Aki declared his restaurant to be the best in Aru, but so did his brother and business rival [[Tojo Marushima|Tojo]]. To settle the question, they each might've offered a group of adventurers a free meal, one night after the other, so they could serve as impartial judges. However, Tojo would pay a person to slip a mild purgative into their food when they dined at Aki's, which would cause them gastrointestinal problems during their adventures.
